extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: E mohio ana ki a koe mo te noho tūmataiti, haumaru Adblock mo YouTube™. Ka aukati i nga Panuitanga i runga i YouTube.com.

timesaveInfo.message: Adblock mo Youtube ™ kua tiakina tata. $SavedTime$ o to oranga.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

videoBranding.message: Kua horoia e Adblock mo YouTube™

displayVideoBranding.message: Whakaatuhia nga korero toronga i raro i te ataata

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Whakaatuhia nga tono kua araia e tatau ana ki te tohu
